modelQuery.sql: select V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.ELEC_NWCNECTS_SK as ELECTRIC_NEW_CONNECTS_SK, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.ELEC_NWCNECTS_ID as ELECTRIC_NEW_CONNECTS_ID, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.ELEC_METER_DATE as ELECTRIC_METER_DATE, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.METER_NUMBER as METER_NUMBER, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.ACCOUNT_SK as ACCOUNT_SK, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.BILL_ACCOUNT_NUM as BILL_ACCOUNT_NUM, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.METER_STATE as METER_STATE, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.METER_DIVISION as METER_DIVISION, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.SCD_IS_CURR_YN as SCD_IS_CURRENT_YN, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.METER_SET_DATE as METER_SET_DATE, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.SCD_EFFECTIVE_TS as SCD_EFFECTIVE_TS, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.METER_DROP_TYPE as METER_DROP_TYPE, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.SCD_END_TS as SCD_END_TS, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.METER_REV_CLASS as METER_REV_CLASS, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.SYS_UPDATE_TS as SYS_UPDATE_TS, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_HM_STRUC_TP as METER_HOME_STRUCTURE_TYPE, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_INSTALL_CODE as METER_INSTALL_CODE, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE as METER_OFFICE, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.AMEND_DATETIME as AMEND_DATETIME, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.UPDATE_DATE as UPDATE_DATE, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.SERVICE_ORDER_NUM as SERVICE_ORDER_NUM, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.OFFICE_HIER_SK as OFFICE_HIERARCHY_SK, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.REVENUE_CLASS_SK as REVENUE_CLASS_SK from [B_Business_Intelligence_Datamart_Prod].V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST

select V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.ELEC_NWCNECTS_SK as NEW_CONNECT_KEY, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.ELEC_NWCNECTS_ID as NEW_CONNECTS_ID, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.ELEC_METER_DATE as METER_DATE, to_char(V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.ELEC_METER_DATE,'yyyy') as YEAR4, case when to_char(V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.ELEC_METER_DATE,'mm') = '01' then 'JANUARY' when to_char(V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.ELEC_METER_DATE,'mm') = '02' then 'FEBRUARY' when to_char(V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.ELEC_METER_DATE,'mm') = '03' then 'MARCH' when to_char(V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.ELEC_METER_DATE,'mm') = '04' then 'APRIL' when to_char(V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.ELEC_METER_DATE,'mm') = '05' then 'MAY' when to_char(V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.ELEC_METER_DATE,'mm') = '06' then 'JUNE' when to_char(V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.ELEC_METER_DATE,'mm') = '07' then 'JULY' when to_char(V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.ELEC_METER_DATE,'mm') = '08' then 'AUGUST' when to_char(V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.ELEC_METER_DATE,'mm') = '09' then 'SEPTEMBER' when to_char(V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.ELEC_METER_DATE,'mm') = '10' then 'OCTOBER' when to_char(V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.ELEC_METER_DATE,'mm') = '11' then 'NOVEMBER' when to_char(V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.ELEC_METER_DATE,'mm') = '12' then 'DECEMBER' end as MONTH5, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.METER_NUMBER as METER_NUMBER, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.BILL_ACCOUNT_NUM as BILL_ACCOUNT_NUM, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.METER_STATE as STATE8, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_HM_STRUC_TP as HOME_STRUCTURE_TYPE, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_INSTALL_CODE as INSTALL_CODE, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.METER_REV_CLASS as REVENUE_CLASS, V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE as OFFICE, case when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '01' then 'RICHMOND' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '02' then 'PETERSBURG' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '03' then 'NORTHERN NECK' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '04' then 'GLOUCESTER' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '05' then 'MIDLOTHIAN' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '06' then 'EAST RICHMOND' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '42' then 'FREDERICKSBURG' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '63' then 'FARMVILLE' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '64' then 'SOUTH HILL' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '65' then 'SOUTH BOSTON' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '66' then 'ALTAVISTA' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '21' then 'NORFOLK' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '22' then 'PENINSULA' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '23' then 'CHESAPEAKE' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '25' then 'VIRGINIA BEACH' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '26' then 'CHUCKATUCK' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '28' then 'WILLIAMSBURG' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '61' then 'ROANOKE RAPIDS' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '62' then 'ALBEMARLE' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '67' then 'AHOSKIE' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '68' then 'OUTER BANKS' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '71' then 'ELIZABETH CITY' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '41' then 'ALEXANDRIA' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '43' then 'FAIRFAX' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '44' then 'HERNDON' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '45' then 'WOODBRIDGE' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '46' then 'SPRINGFIELD' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '47' then 'WARRENTON' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '48' then 'LEESBURG' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '81' then 'CHARLOTTESVILLE' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '82' then 'BLUE RIDGE' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '84' then 'SHENANDOAH' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '85' then 'ROCKBRIDGE' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '86' then 'ALLEGHANY' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '87' then 'ORANGE' else 'PROBLEM' end as OFFICE_NAME, case when (V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE in (01,02,03,04,05,06,42,63,64,65,66)) then 'CENTRAL' when (V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE in (21,22,23,25,26,28,61,62,67,68,71)) then 'EASTERN' when (V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE in (41,43,44,45,46,47,48,81,82,84,85,86,87)) then 'NORTHWEST' else 'PROBLEM' end as REGION, case when (V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE in (03,04)) then 'GLOUCESTER/NORTHERN NECK' when (V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE in (61,62,67,68,71)) then 'NORTH CAROLINA' when (V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE in (41,42,43,44,45,46,47,48)) then 'NORTHERN VIRGINIA' when (V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE in (01,02,05,06)) then 'RICHMOND METRO/TRI-CITIES' when (V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE in (81,82,84,85,86,87)) then 'SHENANDOAH VALLEY/W. PIEDMONT' when (V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE in (63,64,65,66)) then 'SOUTHSIDE VIRGINIA' when (V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE in (21,22,23,25,26,28)) then 'TIDEWATER' else 'PROBLEM' end as GEO_POLITICAL_AREA, case when case when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '01' then 'RICHMOND' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '02' then 'PETERSBURG' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '03' then 'NORTHERN NECK' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '04' then 'GLOUCESTER' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '05' then 'MIDLOTHIAN' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '06' then 'EAST RICHMOND' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '42' then 'FREDERICKSBURG' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '63' then 'FARMVILLE' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '64' then 'SOUTH HILL' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '65' then 'SOUTH BOSTON' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '66' then 'ALTAVISTA' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '21' then 'NORFOLK' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '22' then 'PENINSULA' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '23' then 'CHESAPEAKE' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '25' then 'VIRGINIA BEACH' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '26' then 'CHUCKATUCK' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '28' then 'WILLIAMSBURG' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '61' then 'ROANOKE RAPIDS' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '62' then 'ALBEMARLE' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '67' then 'AHOSKIE' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '68' then 'OUTER BANKS' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '71' then 'ELIZABETH CITY' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '41' then 'ALEXANDRIA' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '43' then 'FAIRFAX' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '44' then 'HERNDON' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '45' then 'WOODBRIDGE' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '46' then 'SPRINGFIELD' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '47' then 'WARRENTON' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '48' then 'LEESBURG' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '81' then 'CHARLOTTESVILLE' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '82' then 'BLUE RIDGE' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '84' then 'SHENANDOAH' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '85' then 'ROCKBRIDGE' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '86' then 'ALLEGHANY' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_OFFICE = '87' then 'ORANGE' else 'PROBLEM' end is not NULL then 'System' end as SYSTEM, case when ((V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_HM_STRUC_TP = 'SFH') and (V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_INSTALL_CODE = 'NR')) then 1 else 0 end as SINGLE_FAMILY_HOME, case when ((V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_INSTALL_CODE = 'NR') and (V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_HM_STRUC_TP = 'THS')) then 1 else 0 end as TOWN_HOUSE, case when ((V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_HM_STRUC_TP = 'MBL') and (V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_INSTALL_CODE = 'NR')) then 1 else 0 end as MOBILE_HOME, case when ((V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_HM_STRUC_TP in ('MRS','GDA')) and (V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_INSTALL_CODE = 'NR')) then 1 else 0 end as NEW_APARTMENT, case when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_INSTALL_CODE = 'RR' then 1 else 0 end as RES_REINSTALL, case when ((V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_INSTALL_CODE = 'NR') and (V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_HM_STRUC_TP = 'OTH')) then 1 else 0 end as APPURT_SERV, case when ((V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_INSTALL_CODE in ('NC','RC')) and (V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.METER_REV_CLASS = 'C')) then 1 else 0 end as COMMERCIAL, case when ((V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.MTR_INSTALL_CODE in ('NC','RC')) and ((V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.METER_REV_CLASS is NULL) or (V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.METER_REV_CLASS <> 'C'))) then 1 else 0 end as C_OTHER, case when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.METER_DROP_TYPE = 'O' then 'OH' when V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST.METER_DROP_TYPE = 'U' then 'UG ' else 'PROBLEM' end as OH_UG from [B_Business_Intelligence_Datamart].V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST

queryItem.name: MONTH
queryItem.expression:
CASE
WHEN
TO_CHAR([Presentation Layer].[NEW_CONNECTS].[METER_DATE] , 'mm') = '01'
THEN 'JANUARY'
WHEN
TO_CHAR([Presentation Layer].[NEW_CONNECTS].[METER_DATE] , 'mm') = '02'
THEN 'FEBRUARY'
WHEN
TO_CHAR([Presentation Layer].[NEW_CONNECTS].[METER_DATE] , 'mm') = '03'
THEN 'MARCH'
WHEN
TO_CHAR([Presentation Layer].[NEW_CONNECTS].[METER_DATE] , 'mm') = '04'
THEN 'APRIL'
WHEN
TO_CHAR([Presentation Layer].[NEW_CONNECTS].[METER_DATE] , 'mm') = '05'
THEN 'MAY'
WHEN
TO_CHAR([Presentation Layer].[NEW_CONNECTS].[METER_DATE] , 'mm') = '06'
THEN 'JUNE'
WHEN
TO_CHAR([Presentation Layer].[NEW_CONNECTS].[METER_DATE] , 'mm') = '07'
THEN 'JULY'
WHEN
TO_CHAR([Presentation Layer].[NEW_CONNECTS].[METER_DATE] , 'mm') = '08'
THEN 'AUGUST'
WHEN
TO_CHAR([Presentation Layer].[NEW_CONNECTS].[METER_DATE] , 'mm') = '09'
THEN 'SEPTEMBER'
WHEN
TO_CHAR([Presentation Layer].[NEW_CONNECTS].[METER_DATE] , 'mm') = '10'
THEN 'OCTOBER'
WHEN
TO_CHAR([Presentation Layer].[NEW_CONNECTS].[METER_DATE] , 'mm') = '11'
THEN 'NOVEMBER'
WHEN
TO_CHAR([Presentation Layer].[NEW_CONNECTS].[METER_DATE] , 'mm') = '12'
THEN 'DECEMBER'
END

queryItem.name: GEO-POLITICAL_AREA
queryItem.expression:
CASE
WHEN [Presentation Layer].[NEW_CONNECTS].[OFFICE] IN (03,04) THEN 'GLOUCESTER/NORTHERN NECK'
WHEN [Presentation Layer].[NEW_CONNECTS].[OFFICE] IN (61,62,67,68,71) THEN 'NORTH CAROLINA'
WHEN [Presentation Layer].[NEW_CONNECTS].[OFFICE] IN (41,42,43,44,45,46,47,48) THEN 'NORTHERN VIRGINIA'
WHEN [Presentation Layer].[NEW_CONNECTS].[OFFICE] IN (01,02,05,06) THEN 'RICHMOND METRO/TRI-CITIES'
WHEN [Presentation Layer].[NEW_CONNECTS].[OFFICE] IN (81,82,84,85,86,87) THEN 'SHENANDOAH VALLEY/W. PIEDMONT'
WHEN [Presentation Layer].[NEW_CONNECTS].[OFFICE] IN (63,64,65,66) THEN 'SOUTHSIDE VIRGINIA'
WHEN [Presentation Layer].[NEW_CONNECTS].[OFFICE] IN (21,22,23,25,26,28) THEN 'TIDEWATER'
ELSE 'PROBLEM'
END

queryItem.name: SYSTEM
queryItem.expression:
Case
When [Presentation Layer].[NEW_CONNECTS].[OFFICE_NAME] is not null
Then 'System'
End

queryItem.name: RES_REINSTALL
queryItem.expression:
CASE
WHEN [Presentation Layer].[NEW_CONNECTS].[INSTALL_CODE] = 'RR'
THEN 1 ELSE 0
END

queryItem.name: OH/UG
queryItem.expression:
CASE
WHEN [Business_Layer].[V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST_SAP].[METER_DROP_TYPE] = 'O' THEN 'OH'
WHEN [Business_Layer].[V_ELECTRIC_NW_CNNCT_HIST_SAP].[METER_DROP_TYPE] = 'U' THEN 'UG ' ELSE 'PROBLEM'
END
